adm:managed-object.name: gssapi-sasl-mechanism-handler
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
is used to perform all processing related to SASL GSSAPI authentication using Kerberos V5.

adm:property.name: realm
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the realm that should be used for GSSAPI authentication.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the realm that should be used by the server for GSSAPI authentication. If this is not provided, then the server will attempt to determine the realm from the Kerberos configuration of the underlying system. Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect immediately.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The server will attempt to determine the realm from the underlying system configuration.

adm:property.name: kdc-address
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the address of the KDC that should be used for Kerberos processing.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the address of the KDC that should be used for Kerberos processing. If provided, this should be a fully-qualified DNS-resolvable name. If this is not provided, then the server will attempt to determine the KDC address from the Kerberos configuration of the underlying system. Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect immediately.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The server will attempt to determine the KDC address from the underlying system configuration.

adm:property.name: keytab
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the path to the keytab file that should be used for Kerberos processing.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the path to the keytab file that should be used for Kerberos processing. If provided, this should be either an absolute path or one that is relative to the server instance root. If this is not provided, then the server will attempt to use the default keytab from the underlying system configuration. Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect immediately.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The server will attempt to use the system-wide default keytab.

adm:property.name: server-fqdn
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the fully-qualified domain name for the system.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the DNS-resolvable fully-qualified domain name for the system. If this is not provided, then the server will attempt to determine this dynamically. Changes to this configuration attribute will take effect immediately.

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The server will attempt to dynamically determine the fully-qualified domain name.

adm:property.name: identity-mapper
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the name of the identity mapper that should be used to match the Kerberos principal to a user entry.
